Letters can either drop down into one grid, or rise up into the other.
Words in each quote are given out of order.
One word from each quote is missing.
Note the name of the speaker of each quote.
Specifically, note the last name of each speaker.
Pair the missing word from each quote with its speaker's last name.
The last names begin with the letters A - G; put the missing words in that same order and read the first letters of the missing words.
